== Who I am ==
''Hello. I am 27 years old and I live at Lisbon, Portugal. However I was born in Madeira Island a very nice island in the Atlantic.
I hold both a BSc and MSc in Computer Science from Universidade Nova de Lisboa and I'm currently pursuing a PhD also in Computer Science.''

== My Ubuntu story ==
''I have started using Linux on servers with FedoraCore1, then CentOS and then Debian. It was not until Ubuntu first release Warty that I decided to pursue using Linux on the desktop and it has been my platform of choice ever since. I'm on Launchpad since 2005 and have been contributing on a wide range of areas from bug reporting to translations and on the <nowiki>[[https://ubuntu-pt.org/|Portuguese LoCo Team]]</nowiki>.''

=== My involvement ===
==== LoCoTeam ====
** Ubuntu Booth demonstrator at the First Free Software Forum Portugal.
** Organized the first Ubuntu-pt meeting. Casual dinner with 18 Ubuntu users.
** Regular at the monthly ubuntu-pt LoCo meetings.
** Translator for Ubuntu in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-pt|Portuguese]]</nowiki>.
** IRC channel support at #ubuntu-pt.
** Responsible for the Portuguese LoCo team <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-pt.org/|website]]</nowiki>.
** Ubuntu advocate in Portugal.
